name: Carrot Pursuit: Christmas Demo
description:
Carrot Pursuit is a tough as nails platformer where you play as a rabbit whos gone mad over his carrots being stolen. 

The game is still currently in development, and this demo only has a christmas-themed level. 

Please join my discord, where i will post updates regularly: https://discord.gg/EVWrdxPhvE
Watch my youtube channel, i might post devlogs every once in  a while: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCfq4kRlFy9IlFeVmxs8ZBLg

please message me if you encounter any bugs!
might update every once in a while
